tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vpn_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    key_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES vpn_tunnel_keys(id)
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_connections (
    connection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    key_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vpn_tunnel_keys (
    key_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    key_name VARCHAR(50),
    key_description TEXT,
    key_encryption_method VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE key_access_control (
    key_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    group_id INT,
    access_level VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (key_id, user_id, group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    key_id INT
);
